Sorry Pank I don't know the solution to you problem.  However I used to
use=
 VisualCafe 4 and now I have moved to Ant, Jikes and a text editor I
suffer=
 less stress.
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Pankaj Solanki [mailto:pso=
lanki@...]
Sent: 05 September 2001 14:18
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subj=
ect: [junit] JUnit3.7 Error message


Hi all,
 
Will any of you plz assess,=
 why my SimpleTest.java file is failing :
  
The problem I am facing is:
 
=
When I compile a junit test file thru' VisualCafe4.0, it gets compiled
with=
out any error.
Later while invoking the TestRunner utility from console (an=
y approach -
textui, awtui or swingui),
I am getting following error messag=
e:
 
java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: junit.framework.Assert: method=

assert(Ljava/lang/String;Z)V did not used to be static
 
 at junit.samples=
.SimpleTest.testAdd(SimpleTest.java:32)
 
But surprisingly if I compile the=
 same file from console and run the
TestRunner utility then test passes wit=
hout any error and it show a
green bar. Perfect run.
 
My VisualCafe4.0 set=
ting is fine (junit.jar and the directory which
contain this jar file is in=
cluded in the classpath of sc.ini file). 
 
Thanks,
 
Pankaj
